Submodules¶

notifications.admin module¶

Admin configuration for the notifications application. Registers notification-related models to the Django admin panel if necessary.

notifications.apps module¶

Application configuration for the notifications application. Handles the registration of signals to automate notifications upon article approval.

Connect signals for the notifications app.

notifications.models module¶

Models for the notifications application. Currently acts as a placeholder or stores notification history if implemented.

notifications.signals module¶

Signal handlers for the notifications application. Automates email alerts and social media posts when articles transition to an approved state.

notifications.signals.on_article_approved(sender, instance, created, **kwargs)[source]¶

Handles side effects when an article is approved. Sends email notifications to subscribers and posts to X. Only triggers when the status actually changes to Approved.

notifications.signals.track_article_state(sender, instance, **kwargs)[source]¶

Track the previous approval state of the article before saving.

notifications.tests module¶

Tests for the notifications application. Verifies that signals correctly trigger email and 3rd-party platform notifications on approval.

notifications.views module¶

Views for the notifications application. Provides endpoints for managing user notification preferences if required.

notifications.x_client module¶

Integration client for X (Twitter) platform. Handles the API interactions required to post news updates to social media.

notifications.x_client.post_to_x(message)[source]¶

Send a post to X (Twitter) platform when a new article is published.
